data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino have now been confirmed.
Marco Piccinini starts the match. Roma with the kick-off in Turin.
In the minute 1, Marco Piccinini awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Torino.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Roma have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Roma in the half of Torino.
In the minute 6, Free kick Torino.
Throw-in for Roma in their own half.
Throw-in for Roma at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 8, Roma's Leonardo Spinazzola is on target but unsuccessful.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Roma to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Marco Piccinini awards Torino a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Roma.
In Turin Roma attack through Bryan Cristante. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 14, Alex Berenguer is on target to give Torino a 1-0 advantage.
Simone Zaza with an assist there.
Marco Piccinini signals a Roma throw-in in Torino's half.
In the minute 16, Goal! Edin Dzeko equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 20, Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Roma's Bryan Cristante breaks free at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 22, Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Turin.
Roma's Leonardo Spinazzola gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Roma.
At Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino, Lyanco for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Goal! Roma have taken a 1-2 lead courtesy of a header from Chris Smalling.
Carles Perez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 24, Torino to take a throw-in in Roma territory.
Bruno Peres is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bruno Peres has recovered and rejoins the match in Turin.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Carles Perez (Roma) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Roma in the half of Torino.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Roma.
Aleksandar Kolarov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Roma.
In the minute 38, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gianluca Mancini (Roma) gets booked by Marco Piccinini, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 40, Torino have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Ball safe as Roma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Torino are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Roma in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Turin.
The second-half is underway. Torino with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Moreno Longo is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino with Koffi Djidji replacing Lyanco.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Can Roma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In the minute 49, In Turin, Simone Verdi of Torino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Torino drives forward and Sasa Lukic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Roma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Davide Zappacosta is replacing Leonardo Spinazzola for Roma at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 53, Soualiho Meite of Torino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Simone Zaza (Torino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Soualiho Meite (Torino) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 55, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Roma in their own half.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Throw-in Roma.
In the minute 58, Can Roma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 60, An attacking Roma player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
It's now 1-3 to Roma as Amadou Diawara scores from the spot.
Roma pushes forward through Bryan Cristante, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 65, Simone Verdi hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Turin for Torino.
Ball goes out of play for a Roma goal kick.
Wilfried Stephane Singo puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-3.
In the minute 67, Roma are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Marco Piccinini awards Torino a goal kick.
Free kick Torino.
In the minute 72, Paulo Fonseca (Roma) is making a second substitution, with Jordan Veretout replacing Bryan Cristante.
Roger Ibanez is replacing Bruno Peres for the away team.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Roma.
Nicolo Zaniolo is on a sub for Carles Perez for Roma.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Roma awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Torino.
Throw-in for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 75, Torino make their second substitution with Andrea Belotti replacing Cristian Ansaldi.
In the minute 76, Nicolo Zaniolo of Roma gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Torino have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Throw-in Roma.
In the minute 79, Marco Piccinini blows against Roma's Aleksandar Kolarov for offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 81, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Nicolo Zaniolo is booked for the away team.
The home team have replaced Alex Berenguer with Ola Aina. This is the third substitution made today by Moreno Longo.
Torino drive forward but Andrea Belotti is judged offside.
In the minute 84, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Roma have a dangerous throw-in.
Marco Piccinini awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Marco Piccinini awards Roma a goal kick.
The home team replace Wilfried Stephane Singo with Michel Ndary Adopo.
Marco Piccinini will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Roma have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Edin Dzeko for the away team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Roma.
Marco Piccinini signals a throw-in for Roma, close to Torino's area.
Torino needs to be cautious. Roma have an attacking throw-in.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team have replaced Henrikh Mkhitaryan with Diego Perotti. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Fonseca.
